transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Good morning sir. Main Kusum baat kar rahi hu India Mart se.
Executive: Haan ji, main karta hu mam thodi der mein aapko na.
Customer: Sir aapko isliye actually call kar rahi thi woh 2 minute baat karni hai aapse. Already aapke sir baat ho chuki hai.
Executive: Mam kar lete hain thoda time do subah subah bhi office mein aake baithe aate hi aapka call aa raha hai. Ruko na.
Customer: Haan sorry. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Kusum calling from India Mart needs to speak for 2 minutes; her superior has already spoken.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for some time as he just arrived in the office.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Kusum apologized and agreed to wait.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to slightly apologetic.



@@@Key Topics:

indiamart, call request
